detaileddescription.para: Window object background style.
Window titlebar background style.
Window content style.
Window scrollbar style.
Window parts.

Create a window objects
par
pointer to an object, it will be the parent of the new window
copy
pointer to a window object, if not NULL then the new object will be copied from it
pointer to the created window

Delete all children of the scrl object, without deleting scrl child.
win
pointer to an object

Add control button to the header of the window
win
pointer to a window object
img_src
an image source ('lv_img_t' variable, path to file or a symbol)
pointer to the created button object

Can be assigned to a window control button to close the window
btn
pointer to the control button on teh widows header
evet
the event type

Set the title of a window
win
pointer to a window object
title
string of the new title

Set the control button size of a window
win
pointer to a window object
control button size

Set the width of the control buttons on the header
win
pointer to a window object
width
width of the control button. 0: to make them square automatically.

Set the size of the content area.
win
pointer to a window object
w
width
h
height (the window will be higher with the height of the header)

Set the layout of the window
win
pointer to a window object
layout
the layout from 'lv_layout_t'

Set the scroll bar mode of a window
win
pointer to a window object
sb_mode
the new scroll bar mode from 'lv_sb_mode_t'

Set focus animation duration on lv_win_focus()
win
pointer to a window object
anim_time
duration of animation [ms]

Set drag status of a window. If set to 'true' window can be dragged like on a PC.
win
pointer to a window object
en
whether dragging is enabled

Get the title of a window
win
pointer to a window object
title string of the window

Get the content holder object of window (lv_page) to allow additional customization
win
pointer to a window object
the Page object where the window's content is

Get the control button size of a window
win
pointer to a window object
control button size

Get the header height
win
pointer to a window object
header height

Get the width of the control buttons on the header
win
pointer to a window object
width of the control button. 0: square.

Get the pointer of a widow from one of its control button. It is useful in the action of the control buttons where only button is known.
ctrl_btn
pointer to a control button of a window
pointer to the window of 'ctrl_btn'

Get the layout of a window
win
pointer to a window object
the layout of the window (from 'lv_layout_t')

Get the scroll bar mode of a window
win
pointer to a window object
the scroll bar mode of the window (from 'lv_sb_mode_t')

Get focus animation duration
win
pointer to a window object
duration of animation [ms]

Get width of the content area (page scrollable) of the window
win
pointer to a window object
the width of the content area

Get drag status of a window. If set to 'true' window can be dragged like on a PC.
win
pointer to a window object
whether window is draggable

Focus on an object. It ensures that the object will be visible in the window.
win
pointer to a window object
obj
pointer to an object to focus (must be in the window)
anim_en
LV_ANIM_ON focus with an animation; LV_ANIM_OFF focus without animation

Scroll the window horizontally
win
pointer to a window object
dist
the distance to scroll (< 0: scroll right; > 0 scroll left)

Scroll the window vertically
win
pointer to a window object
dist
the distance to scroll (< 0: scroll down; > 0 scroll up)
